Producer: Dylan Sellers, David Glasser, Andreas Klein, Guy Oseary, David Nicksay
Screenwriter: Scott Alexander, Larry Karaszewski, Ashley Miller, Zack Stentz, Jeffrey Charles Jurgensen
Sound Mix: Dolby SR, DTS, Dolby Stereo, Surround, SDDS, Dolby A, Dolby Digital
Synopsis: High school student Cody Banks wants nothing more than what every other teen wants: to survive the banality of adolescence and become an adult. However, Banks is no ordinary teen; he's a CIA agent. When he's not doing his homework, Banks is on the case, spying on fellow student Natalie Connors to get close to her father, a scientist who has invented killer nanobots designed to bring down the country.
Title: Agent Cody Banks
